name: todo-fullstack-app
description: Full-stack Todo application with React frontend and Flask backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "React,Flask" -c "cyan,yellow" "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && python run.py"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false" "cd backend && python -m pytest tests/ -v"
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && make clean
scripts.health: concurrently "curl -f http://localhost:5000/api/health" "curl -f http://localhost:3000" || echo 'One or both servers are not running'
scripts.logs:backend: tail -f backend/logs/app.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backend log file found'
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd frontend && serve -s build -l 3000" "cd backend && gunicorn -w 4 -b 0.0.0.0:5000 'app:create_app()'"
